issue.title: [R] Use InMemoryDataset for Table/RecordBatch in dplyr code
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12731](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12731). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This lets us consolidate our Expression handling code and prepares us for more query evaluation in the near future. As a bonus, it should also simplify our dplyr NSE function definition and make it easier to add and test them going forward.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12731?focusedCommentId=17343958) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10191
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10191>
